text: Hi all, I'm looking to style HubSpot forms in wordpress and I'm not the strongest developer! Does anyone have a list of key field classes that need to be included or know where I can find one? Or just any good tips?? Thanks!!!
You can wrap the form in a div with specific class and then you can style the fields accordingly.
Anyone else’s test HS portals having a hard time loading/refreshing, mine keeps saying “waiting for <http://cdn2.HubSpot.net|cdn2.HubSpot.net>…, it doesnt happen all the time but ever so often
